title: Return of the Goddess - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Bullying   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Movies   Mysterious Past   Past Plays a Big Role   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Secretive Protagonist   Showbiz   Tragic Past   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
When she left the capital city, she was fat, chubby and white in everybody’s eyes. When she returned to the capital city, she was perfect; a goddess in everybody’s eyes.

A reporter once asked her: What do you think is most important for a woman?

She simply smiled and answered: The most important thing is to be good to ourselves.

When a person has a crush, other than the person himself, no one will know.>
